aggressive.purpose: Hook - grab attention with relatable problem
aggressive.prompt:
A medium close-up of a spokesperson in a Clean, modern background.

CHARACTER: A female in her early-to-mid 20s with a friendly and approachable appearance. She has long, shoulder-length dark brown hair styled in soft waves with subtle lighter brown highlights, parted slightly off-center. Her facial features include large, expressive dark brown eyes, prominent and well-defined dark eyebrows, and a wide, genuine smile revealing straight, white teeth. She has a slender build and is dressed in a casual, relatable style: a plain white, short-sleeved, crew-neck t-shirt and light-wash, high-waisted denim jeans.

SETTING: Clean, modern background
LIGHTING: Bright, professional
EMOTION: urgent, intense, dynamic
CAMERA: dynamic, energetic camera movement

VOICEOVER (spokesperson speaks directly to camera):
"I was paying $120 a month for car insurance until I found a link that changed everything. After a quick two-minute check, I qualified for $39 a month. Same coverage, way less money."

The spokesperson maintains eye contact with camera, uses natural hand gestures, and delivers the message with urgent, intense, dynamic energy. Dynamic, energetic camera movement.

Duration: 12 seconds
Style: Professional advertising, direct-to-camera testimonial
Quality: 4K, sharp focus, well-lit
aggressive.script_segment: I was paying $120 a month for car insurance until I found a link that changed everything. After a quick two-minute check, I qualified for $39 a month. Same coverage, way less money.

The visuals support the voiceover message but contain ZERO humans. Focus on driving imagery: vehicles, roads, documents, settings, abstract visuals.
